About PI


Dr. Venkattasubbaiah Krishnan

Associate Professor
School of Chemical Sciences
National Institute of Science Education and Research (NISER)
Orissa-752050 , India





  • B.Sc University of Madras, Madras, India. 1992-1996
  • M.Sc Anna University, Madras, India. 1996-1998
  • Ph.D IIT-Kanpur 1998-2003




  • Post-doctoral Fellow-Rutgers University Dec. 2003-Dec. 2006
  • Post-doctoral Fellow-Georgia Tech. Jan.2007-Aug. 2009
  • Research Scientist-Georgia Tech. Sep. 2009-May 2011
  • Assistant Professor-NISER June 2011– June 2013
  • Reader-F-NISER July 2013– June 2018
  • Associate Professor-NISER July 2018– till date




  • Senior Research Fellowship from Council of Scientific and Industrial Research, New Delhi — 2001-2003
  • Ramanujan Fellowship, DST, India— 2011

My group specializes in Inorganic, Organic and Polymer Chemistry. We focus on the developement of new synthetic routes for application in catalysis and materials chemistry.
